Tool

NamePolynomial Trend from Grids
ID9
AuthorO. Conrad (c) 2011
Specificationgrid

Description

Fits for each cell a polynomial trend function. Outputs are the polynomial coefficients for the polynomial trend function of chosen order.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Dependent Variables Grid list (input)Y_GRIDS
Independent Variable (per Grid and Cell) (*)Grid list (optional input)X_GRIDS
Output
Polynomial CoefficientsGrid list (output)COEFF
Coefficient of Determination (*)Grid (optional output)R2
Options
Polynomial OrderIntegerORDERMinimum: 1 Default: 1
Get Independent Variable from ...ChoiceXSOURCEAvailable Choices: [0] list order [1] table [2] grid list Default: 0
Independent Variable (per Grid)Static tableX_TABLE1 Fields: - 1. [8 byte floating point number] Value
(*) optional
